DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myMenuText: Generate Air Traffic from Flight Plans
DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription:
Reads X-Plane format flight plans from ../data/flightPlans and generates air traffic along the descibed routes.
Note: Requires airport and runway feature data in the terrain.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>maxAircraft</myVariableName> <myType>integer</myType> <myLabel>Maximum Aircraft</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>50</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>1</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>500</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>createEnroute</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Create Enroute</myLabel> <myToolTip>Create aircraft already in the air at a random distance along the route</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>areaOfInterest</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Area of Interest</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAreasFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
